page.title: 17Health
page.content: Inside Preston hospital only the Operating Room and tools were sterilized the rest of the hospital was cleaned.Some of the nurses are trained for special wards.The difference between some nurses is the time they train,a student nurse trains for 3 years to become a staff nurse and she trains for 2 years to become a sister.In a ward there are about 30-32 beds.On a ward there are 2 sisters,2 staff nurses, 2 S.E.N.pupils and student nurses.tThere are more female than male nurses but males get easier promotions.A porter takes paitents to other departments such as the operating room.The O.R. is kept very clean an donly a limited number of people work it.In an average size hospital there are 50 wards.No jewellery is worn by nurses in case it falls into a wound. by Elaine Towers
